overview: YOU NEVER KNOW WHAT WILL COME THROUGH THAT PAWN SHOP DOOR...  When a double crossed deal between dirty police detectives (Ty Slater, Kevin Moriarty) and ruthless drug enforcers (Dave Curry, Chris Curry) goes awry, a struggling addict musician (Rich Ledoux) finds himself in possession of the sole item that can put an end to the out-of-control, bloody feud... So naturally he heads down to the local pawn shop to score a few bucks off it!  After the problematic item becomes stuck within the shops secure walls, the two pawnbrokers (Steve Drake, Josh Williams) must fight to survive before a bombardment of violence strikes!  Can everyone survive when all three storylines come crashing down on the small town hock shop?
tagline: The fear of death can only carry a man so far...
title: Hocked
